sentences.en: Before all this the island was populated by native American Arawaks.
sentences.cn: 在所有这一切发生之前，这个岛上居住的是印第安阿拉瓦克人。

sentences.en: Further to the south are some of the island'sloveliest unspoilt coves.
sentences.cn: 再往南走有一些这个岛上尚未被破坏的迷人小海湾。

sentences.en: He made it his object in life to find the island.
sentences.cn: 他把找到那座岛屿当成自己的人生目标。

sentences.en: He was the most important person on the island.
sentences.cn: 他是岛上最有声望的人。

sentences.en: I live on an island.
sentences.cn: 我住在一个岛上。

sentences.en: The beautiful island of Cyprus is a magical place to get married.
sentences.cn: 美丽的塞浦路斯岛是缔结良缘的美妙之地。

sentences.en: The causeway to the island is only accessible at low tide.
sentences.cn: 通往该岛的堤道只有在枯潮时才能通行。

sentences.en: The Cayman Islands
sentences.cn: 开曼群岛

sentences.en: the Greek island of Crete
sentences.cn: 希腊克里特岛

sentences.en: The island is only 200m wide at its narrowest point.
sentences.cn: 该岛最狭窄处仅200米宽.

sentences.en: The island is surmounted by a huge black castle.
sentences.cn: 岛的最高处耸立着一座巨大的黑色城堡。

sentences.en: The island may be reached by boat from the mainland.
sentences.cn: 这个岛屿可以从大陆乘小船到达。

sentences.en: The island offers such a wide variety of scenery and wildlife.
sentences.cn: 这个岛屿拥有丰富多样的景致及种类繁多的野生动植物。

sentences.en: The island's ruggedness symbolises our history and the character of the people.
sentences.cn: 这个岛屿的凹凸险峻象征着我们的历史和民族性格。

sentences.en: The Regent hotel has a superlative view of Hong Kong island.
sentences.cn: 在丽晶酒店看香港岛的美景，视野绝佳。

sentences.en: Then one day, an English ship anchored near the island.
sentences.cn: 然后有一天，一艘英国船在岛附近抛锚了。

sentences.en: They were going to sail around the little island, against the tide.
sentences.cn: 他们打算绕着小岛逆潮航行。

sentences.en: This is because the island is so close to the equator. So you can choose to go whenever you like.
sentences.cn: 就因为这个岛是如此接近赤道。所以只要你愿意你任何时候都可以去。

sentences.en: We shall be skirting the island on our way.
sentences.cn: 我们将一路环岛而行。

sentences.en: We'll make a trip by launch to White Island.
sentences.cn: 我们将乘汽艇到怀特岛。

phrases.tran_cn: 康尼岛；科尼岛（位于纽约的小岛）；甜筒岛
复活节岛（位于太平洋，属于智利）
大屿山（香港境内最大的岛屿）
长岛（美国纽约州东南部岛屿）
斯塔顿岛（地名，位于纽约）
温哥华岛（加拿大西南部岛屿）

trans.tran_en: a piece of land completely surrounded by water
a piece of land completely surrounded by water
